page.title: 03LANDSCAPE
page.content: The area is situated on the northern side of the valley of the {River {Dearne.}The highest point is at { {Staincross}, 165m above sea level. Two thirds of the area is either reclaimed industrial land, farmland or wasteland. There have been many schemes to reclaim the land used for coal mining. The spoil heaps{Muck {Stacks!}at {Mapplewell}and{Athersley} have been smoothed out and replanted with grass and trees. The land in the S.W. is still left as wasteland. There are no working farms in the area. Most of the farmers have sold their land for housing development. The farmland in the area belongs to farms in other areas, and is used for growing some cereals, fodder or grazing.
